name: Superhuman Strength
description: Attacks that demonstrate extraordinary physical power, often resulting in massive destruction.

name: Rapid-Fire Strikes
description: Fast, consecutive punches or kicks, overwhelming foes with speed and frequency.

name: Energy Projection
description: The ability to emit powerful blasts of energy, capable of long-range attacks.

name: Supernatural Speed
description: Attacks delivered with incredible velocity, often leaving the opponent no time to react.

name: Explosive Impact
description: Attacks focused on delivering a large amount of force in a single, devastating blow.

name: Martial Arts Techniques
description: Skillful hand-to-hand combat moves, employing technique and precision over raw power.

name: Weapon Mastery
description: Utilizing weapons such as swords or firearms with exceptional skill and accuracy.

name: Sonic/Sound Waves
description: Harnessing sound or sonic waves to attack, potentially disorienting or damaging through vibration.

name: Elemental Manipulation
description: Control over elements like fire, ice, or wind, using them to create varied attack forms.

name: Psychokinetic Powers
description: Utilizing telekinesis or psychic energy to attack, capable of manipulating objects or opponents.

name: Transformational Abilities
description: Changing form to enhance physical or elemental abilities, often increasing attack power.

name: Regenerative Skills
description: Rapid healing capabilities that can quickly recover from attacks, providing sustained combat endurance.

name: Acrobatic Combat
description: Using agility and acrobatics to evade attacks and counter with precision.

name: Brute Force
description: Reliance on overwhelming power and physical might to crush opponents, often lacking finesse.

name: Energy Absorption
description: The ability to absorb energy from attacks or the environment, using it for counterattacks or power boosts.

name: Size Manipulation
description: Altering physical size to gain advantage in power or evasion, making the user harder to hit or stronger.

name: Aerial Assaults
description: Launching attacks from or through the air, often taking advantage of height or mobility.

name: Stealth Attacks
description: Using stealth or surprise to attack, often catching the opponent off guard for a critical hit.

name: Animalistic Traits
description: Emulating animal abilities or behaviors in combat, utilizing instincts and natural weaponry.

name: Technological Enhancements
description: Using advanced technology or machinery to augment attacks, increasing power or versatility.

name: Defensive Techniques
description: Focusing on defense, using blocks, parries, or barriers to protect and counter.

name: Poisonous Attacks
description: Utilizing toxins or venoms to weaken or incapacitate opponents over time.

name: Illusionary Tricks
description: Creating illusions to deceive, disorient, or distract opponents, often leading to a surprise attack.

name: Gravity Control
description: Manipulating gravity for offensive use, can immobilize opponents or enhance the impact of attacks.

name: Biological Warfare
description: Attacks using biological processes, such as spores, viruses, or other natural hazards.

name: Seismic Powers
description: Harnessing the power of the earth, causing quakes or manipulating the terrain for attacks.

name: Cyber Warfare
description: Using digital means for attack, like hacking or cybernetic interference, effective against technology-based foes.

name: Mystical Forces
description: Utilizing arcane or mystical energies for attacks, often with unpredictable effects.

name: Vampiric Powers
description: Draining energy or health from opponents to weaken them and strengthen the user.

name: Cosmic Powers
description: Attacks involving cosmic or space-related forces, often with grand and far-reaching effects.
